The Jewish Question is progressing with an indescribable cruelty. The scenes of killing described to me by trustworthy people – for example by the judges who visited the camp of 10 thousand people in an old brickfield close to Budapest – are unbelievable. Lately, the Jews were being shot by machine guns, only because they were arguing between each other and needed to be silenced.

III./ Coming back from Bratislava, I was travelling together with the former delegate Jagow who spent one day at Ludin´s. He was coming here from the Hitler´s headquarters, where he is currently serving.

Jagow told me that his dear friend Ludin is a very good delegate for us. The decision-making moves are about to be done in the west, thus the invasion will be sorted out. Although there is currently a fallback in Russia, it is said that the Führer ordered the German troops to fight for as long as they can only to cause as extensive damages and losses to Russia as possible. Similarly it goes on in Italy. The clearing out of the areas is not a horrific situation, since the war will be decided in the west very soon. The new secret weapons are only to be introduced.
V./ On the sixth day of this month I dined at Mr. Veesenmayer and we had a lengthier discussion, out of which I want to quote few interesting things:
I mentioned to Veesenmayer Ludin's intervention in the Jewish Question in our country and he explained it to me as follows:

According to him, neither the Hungarian government, nor the high Hungarian officials intervened in the question of Slovak Jews. Although Hungarians sometimes try to talk bad about Germans in our country, it did not happen in this situation. He intervened on his own initiative. He has been hearing information that Jews were, in large numbers, fleeing to Slovakia (to explain it, there are the German SS soldiers in about each fifth village and they report on their observations). He got direct reports that from the eastern part of the country Jews were fleeing to Slovakia. When it comes to Jewish children, he knows only about around 500 – 700 kids who came to our country. He also emphasized that by now over 20 secret Jewish radio channels were discovered. Two days ago, they discovered a radio station in which Jews from Hungary , Romania and who knows what other nationality played part. He is aware of about 4000 Jews who escaped to Slovakia. They have specific proofs that even some of the convicted escaped there. In Slovakia, where the Jewish Question has been already sorted out, the mass waves of new Jews can cause further troubles. He is therefore planning a visit to Slovakia, to talk to Ludin about this issue in person. (He would also like to buy Lipas, which are the best cigarettes in the world. I will provide him with these.) In general, he wants the borders to be closed more tightly, so that the Hungarian Jews cannot cross pass.
I suppose he will be asking for the cross passers to be handed over.
When it comes to the overall situation, he mentioned the plans for a new German attack on the British, to put an end to the invasion.
